blog.title: Sweet Creature💚💙
blog.description: Chello💖// 22💁🏻// bisexual✌🏻️// Demi Lovato and One Direction are my heroes🌟// Larry Stylinson💚💙

summary:
I got a girl crush
Hate to admit it but I got a heart rush
It ain’t slowing down
I got it real bad, want everything she has
That...
body:
I got a girl crush

Hate to admit it but I got a heart rush

It ain’t slowing down

I got it real bad, want everything she has

That smile and that midnight laugh she’s giving you now…

blog.name: homosociallyyours
blog.title: i am a homosocialsexual
blog.description:
megan/39/she&they pronouns. 
please be 18+ if you follow me.
queer, fat, genderqueer femme. geeky, nerdy, and really into cheese. seriously. 
i reblog a lot of queer and gay things; femmeslash of many varieties, sherlock (johnlock, johnlockstrade, not mad at mary morstan, not happy about s4 but not super salty either), 1D (ot5 &ot4, larrie/harrie/louie, don't come at me with negativity about any one of my darling boys), star wars (carrie fisher/space mom), and a multitude of other fandoms that are all over the place; and really anything else that strikes my fancy, including some things that may be nsfw. oh, and martin freeman. i love him. in a truly filthy way. 
i write, i draw, i squeal over things i love. i live for getting to know new people, so please don't hesitate to send me a message about all the things. always.

tags: maybe should've used a read more but oh well
if you read it all the way thru then bless
i know other ppl had way better things to say
but i wanted to say something too
and now i'm gonna sleep bc damn i'm tired
summary: I’m finally home after a basically perfect trip with @statementlou. We celebrated her birthday today in the best of...
body:
I’m finally home after a basically perfect trip with @statementlou. We celebrated her birthday today in the best of fashion–swimming in the Pacific and eating her favorite kind of food (organic plant-based stuff, @ cafe gratitude) and just generally bopping around LA listening to music and laughing our asses off. It was fuckin great. 

But!! I need to write about the show. 

First of all, the show at the Forum was more magical than the show in San Jose, for me. The venue was perfect for Harry: the acoustics, the drama, the lighting, all of it. And somehow, though it really shouldn’t have been possible, we ended up with the most amazing seats I could’ve imagined. We were on the first row behind stage right. Looking down, I could see backstage, and it was so fun to watch guitars getting tuned and people running around during Kacey’s set. And when Harry came on? I’ve thought about it and checked with Bander, and she agreed: Harry looked right at us with a giant grin. We definitely stood out in the section, and we were right up front. I’m not kidding when I say that I think about it and can’t stop smiling. Ugh. 

Every bit of energy was ramped up as compared with the previous show. The room felt different, Harry felt different,  it was all just so much more. Bigger. Like the moment right before a storm hits and the air changes and you know the rain is gonna pour any minute. 

Of course there was more than one storm. B stage was a long, low rumble of thunder, each song full of promise. When he stayed after IICF the room felt like it shook, we were all on edge wanting to know what was next (I was anyway, I guess some folks knew GC was coming). And gosh, Girl Crush was amazing. I never thought I’d hear it live, and it felt so special. So honest and bare and bold. Like. My fuckin heart. Damn. 

And then there’s the moment, which I don’t see as a coming out any more than the multitude of other signals he’s given. But when he said “we’re all a little bit gay,” I definitely had a moment of nodding along like–okay then, yes, good, he keeps upping the ante and I see it and love it. The cheers from the crowd felt really good there, too. He really was making it a space for everyone to be free. And then WMYB, which has always been my problematic fave but which he’s turned into a song of my heart: an anthem of self acceptance and queerness, of being the person who everyone sees is queer– weird and gay and just Not Like Everyone –and seeing yourself as less than, only to have this fucking sweetheart up there saying, “no no no, you’ve got it all wrong!! being a rainbow is what makes you beautiful! and i want you to know it!” 

IT IS SO IMPORTANT AND IT MAKES ME SO HAPPY AND I WANT TO SHOUT ABOUT IT SO HERE’S THAT FOR A MOMENT. 

Ahem. Anyway. KiwiKiwiKiwi!!!!! Y’all, it’s confession time: I wasn’t hyped on Kiwi on the album. I mean, I like it. But sometimes it was just a little…much? Not enough? IDK. There was something about it that I didn’t love. But seeing it live? FUCK. Transformative. Seeing it live three times in a row with Harry getting (impossibly) more amped at each go, running to B Stage and back to sing more in spite of having just done an astonishingly energetic 2 hr show and jumping and flailing all around the stage, falling to his knees, just letting fucking loose? Damn. 

I have never screamed like I was screaming. Except that’s a lie, because I have, but it’s usually alone in my car, blasting Bikini Kill to induce cartharsis. No, the only thing I can equate with my feelings during Kiwi are the years when I was super religious in high school and really let loose at a Catholic youth event. It was that kind of euphoria– the sort that comes from the emotional high of releasing your worry and fear and letting another energy fill up all that space. Kiwi filled up that space with sound and exuberant joy. With love. 

Man, it was fucking beautiful. 

I still can’t believe it was real. I can’t believe I have to wait so long to see him again. I can’t believe anything could be better (though I have a feeling that LT1 is going to match it, because if there’s anyone I love as much as Harry, it’s Louis.)

reblog.comment:
I’m finally home after a basically perfect trip with @statementlou. We celebrated her birthday today in the best of fashion–swimming in the Pacific and eating her favorite kind of food (organic plant-based stuff, @ cafe gratitude) and just generally bopping around LA listening to music and laughing our asses off. It was fuckin great. 

But!! I need to write about the show. 

First of all, the show at the Forum was more magical than the show in San Jose, for me. The venue was perfect for Harry: the acoustics, the drama, the lighting, all of it. And somehow, though it really shouldn’t have been possible, we ended up with the most amazing seats I could’ve imagined. We were on the first row behind stage right. Looking down, I could see backstage, and it was so fun to watch guitars getting tuned and people running around during Kacey’s set. And when Harry came on? I’ve thought about it and checked with Bander, and she agreed: Harry looked right at us with a giant grin. We definitely stood out in the section, and we were right up front. I’m not kidding when I say that I think about it and can’t stop smiling. Ugh. 

Every bit of energy was ramped up as compared with the previous show. The room felt different, Harry felt different,  it was all just so much more. Bigger. Like the moment right before a storm hits and the air changes and you know the rain is gonna pour any minute. 

Of course there was more than one storm. B stage was a long, low rumble of thunder, each song full of promise. When he stayed after IICF the room felt like it shook, we were all on edge wanting to know what was next (I was anyway, I guess some folks knew GC was coming). And gosh, Girl Crush was amazing. I never thought I’d hear it live, and it felt so special. So honest and bare and bold. Like. My fuckin heart. Damn. 

And then there’s the moment, which I don’t see as a coming out any more than the multitude of other signals he’s given. But when he said “we’re all a little bit gay,” I definitely had a moment of nodding along like–okay then, yes, good, he keeps upping the ante and I see it and love it. The cheers from the crowd felt really good there, too. He really was making it a space for everyone to be free. And then WMYB, which has always been my problematic fave but which he’s turned into a song of my heart: an anthem of self acceptance and queerness, of being the person who everyone sees is queer– weird and gay and just Not Like Everyone –and seeing yourself as less than, only to have this fucking sweetheart up there saying, “no no no, you’ve got it all wrong!! being a rainbow is what makes you beautiful! and i want you to know it!” 

IT IS SO IMPORTANT AND IT MAKES ME SO HAPPY AND I WANT TO SHOUT ABOUT IT SO HERE’S THAT FOR A MOMENT. 

Ahem. Anyway. KiwiKiwiKiwi!!!!! Y’all, it’s confession time: I wasn’t hyped on Kiwi on the album. I mean, I like it. But sometimes it was just a little…much? Not enough? IDK. There was something about it that I didn’t love. But seeing it live? FUCK. Transformative. Seeing it live three times in a row with Harry getting (impossibly) more amped at each go, running to B Stage and back to sing more in spite of having just done an astonishingly energetic 2 hr show and jumping and flailing all around the stage, falling to his knees, just letting fucking loose? Damn. 

I have never screamed like I was screaming. Except that’s a lie, because I have, but it’s usually alone in my car, blasting Bikini Kill to induce cartharsis. No, the only thing I can equate with my feelings during Kiwi are the years when I was super religious in high school and really let loose at a Catholic youth event. It was that kind of euphoria– the sort that comes from the emotional high of releasing your worry and fear and letting another energy fill up all that space. Kiwi filled up that space with sound and exuberant joy. With love. 

Man, it was fucking beautiful. 

I still can’t believe it was real. I can’t believe I have to wait so long to see him again. I can’t believe anything could be better (though I have a feeling that LT1 is going to match it, because if there’s anyone I love as much as Harry, it’s Louis.)

title: Meet Me In the Hallway
body:
A Harry Styles AU

Three.

A few weeks had passed since the party and I had ultimately sworn off heavy drinking for a while, only opting for a bit of wine or a single pint of beer, not daring to push it any further than that….

Read more…

summary: ok so i’ve seen so many imagines that y/n is the one having panic attacks, but what if harry is the one having it? ( im so sad...
question: ok so i’ve seen so many imagines that y/n is the one having panic attacks, but what if harry is the one having it? ( im so sad thinking of him like this ) LIKE WHEN HE GOT MOBBED IN THE CAR thank you
answer:
HDJSHSJAJAIA nooo :-((

He would still have the mask for his mouth as he went inside the car, a mob of fans started to run towards it which made his heart beats faster. His palms were started to sweat as they were coming closer, it was his least favorite, being mobbed in public places.

His head was spinning when he heard endless taps against the windows, he felt like the young girls were eating him alive. He looked at the ground, completely tired and wanting all of this to end.

His driver looked at him in his mirror, already concerned about him because he knows he has a flu and needed to be in a calm place. His driver honked the car too many times, which made Harry closed his eyes, his vision were getting blurry every minute.

“H? Are you—“

“I wanna talk to Y/N…” He croaked out. Himself didn’t even understands his words that came out from his mouth, but he wants to talk to her so bad, so all his pain will go away. His driver quickly dialed her number, and gave it to Harry.

“Hello?” Her voice made him sigh in relief. He found his heart going back to it’s natural phase and he couldn’t ask for any better.

“Hey, angel.” He whispered. She giggled a little bit, and Harry didn’t paid any attention of his surroundings anymore, all of his attention was on hers. He missed her so much, not being to see her for months was killing him slowly inside.

“You okay? Already saw some of your pictures here.”

“I’m fine now, just had a little panic attack ‘s all.” He heard her gasp at the other line, which made him look out of the window, already expecting her to freak out.

“Oh my god, Harry, are you okay now?” She was pacing around the room, full of worries in her voice. Harry sighed, and ran his hand through his hair.

“I’m fine now, really, but it would be better if you were here.” A smile were formed on her lips as he said those words, he never failed to make her feel loved and appreciated.

“I know, but, I want you to stay safe there, alright?”

“I will. Love you.” He smirked against the phone, which made her smile on the other line.

“I love you too.”

“You okay? Already saw some of your pictures here.”

“I’m fine now, just had a little panic attack ‘s all.” He heard her gasp at the other line, which made him look out of the window, already expecting her to freak out.

“Oh my god, Harry, are you okay now?” She was pacing around the room, full of worries in her voice. Harry sighed, and ran his hand through his hair.

“I’m fine now, really, but it would be better if you were here.” A smile were formed on her lips as he said those words, he never failed to make her feel loved and appreciated.

“I know, but, I want you to stay safe there, alright?”

“I will. Love you.” He smirked against the phone, which made her smile on the other line.

“I love you too.”

*treat people with damn kindness*

tags: not too much to ask is it?
summary: Things I want post-Harry Styles live on tour
body:
Things I want post-Harry Styles live on tour

1. A lovingly curated coffee table book full of tour photos and BTS shots. Maybe two - a separate one for all the suits - fittings, bits from Harry, Harry L, Harris and all the designers on what their vision was, close ups of the detail etc.

2. The tour documentary!!! Good quality audio of every song (Medicine, Anna, Girl Crush, Still the One, Kiwi intro) and lots of BTS glimpses & interviews. Pre-tour planning/vision. Post-tour reflections.

3. A fashion exhibit at a museum somewhere showcasing all the suits up close and personal. What else are you gonna do with them Styles? They’ll just collect dust.

4. Harry and CHASM and all the wonderful people on tour to get a lovely break with their families. Lots of rest, relaxation and time for H to write HS2 and whatever else he has planned.

5. That all my lovely Harries who have brought me such joy over the past year continue to be wonderful and creative and kind and get just enough Harry content to keep them going while H goes ghost.

blog.title: ‘Is it straight?’ 'No, gay’
blog.description:
mary, 22

harry and louis are in love

edits | ii

summary: Can you write about y/n spoil Harry too much like H has to sleep with y/n rubbing his back and playing with his hair while...
question: Can you write about y/n spoil Harry too much like H has to sleep with y/n rubbing his back and playing with his hair while laying on top of her. Until he fall asleep. He would be whining like a baby if y/n didn’t do it every night.
answer:
god that would be sooooo cute !!

He would be the needy one, and always be the little spoon after a long day at work. He always sprints upstairs, not caring if he’s still on his clothes on, which you’re used to him being on his boxers only and flopping beside you.

“Don’t you need to change something comfortable first? Like before sleeping?” You sat up, and rest your head on the head board, already patting a space beside you for Harry to lay on. He groaned in response, removing his jacket only, and laying now beside you.

“M’ tired, Y/N. Can’t even move my fingers.” He whined, pressing his cheeks on the pillow, ready to take his beauty sleep, but you shook him again making him groan.

“C’mere, I’ll make sure you get your well deserved rest.” You patted your chest for him to lay down on. Harry gave you a confused look, but he shrugged for a Iittle bit and finally laying his head on your chest. As your fingers started to massage his hair, he let out a moan and snuggled closer to you, hiding his face on the crook of your neck.

“More, please.” He begged, pushing his body close to yours, you smiled at him, you knew he deserved every pleasure he feels right now. Until, it became your routine every night, after his long shows and long flights, he would beg for it everyday.

He would whine a lot, as he started to feel you removing your hold on his body. Your heart would flutter in joy when he still holds you tight at night, he would burry his face on your chest, while you still rub your hands on his back to keep him calm and relaxed.

“God, couldn’t ask for any better than you.”
